body: Nope, sorry, this breaks cloud-testing vendors due to the changes in pytest-html + others; let me update https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/250dbebc93b3261a756c65e9468612bc5b805059/functional_tests/requirements/constraints.txt and push that, and give it another whirl.
body_text: Nope, sorry, this breaks cloud-testing vendors due to the changes in pytest-html + others; let me update https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/250dbebc93b3261a756c65e9468612bc5b805059/functional_tests/requirements/constraints.txt and push that, and give it another whirl.
body_html: Nope, sorry, this breaks cloud-testing vendors due to the changes in pytest-html + others; let me update https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/250dbebc93b3261a756c65e9468612bc5b805059/functional_tests/requirements/constraints.txt and push that, and give it another whirl.
